
(*) Map 1:1 to utf8

    [000000,000080) --> 1000000
    [000080,000800) --> 2000080
    [000800,010000) --> 3000800
    [010000,200000) --> 4010000

    [0] at 00000000: Codec Interval [1000000,1000080)
    [1] at 00000080: Codec Interval [2000080,2000800)
    [2] at 00000800: Codec Interval [3000800,3010000)
    [3] at 00010000: Codec Interval [4010000,4200000)
